settings.comment: Scale for waypoint label text. 0 is very small and 100 is largest.
0 = Label Only, 1 = Label + Distance, 2 = Label + Coordinates.
Upper limit for the Render Distance slider in blocks.
Enable fade out of beacons as you get closer to them.

settings.name: Near_Fade_Start
settings.comment: Distance from beacon where near-fade begins. This should be larger than Near Fade End

settings.name: Near_Fade_End
settings.comment: Distance from beacon where it is fully faded out.
If enabled, newly-created waypoints default to beacon enabled.

settings.name: Beacon_render_engine_enabled
settings.comment: Sets the beacon render engine on or off.
Enabled = Show Beams, Disabled = Show labels only.
